oldProtocol: - Plasmalogens (1 mL of each Glia and Neuro)***
reason: Resveratrol has been shown to inhibit the NLRP3 inflammasome, which plays a pivotal role in the pathogenesis of Alzheimer's disease. Adding resveratrol may help modulate neuroinflammation and provide neuroprotective effects.

Quercetin is known to inhibit NLRP3 inflammasome activation and may help reduce neuroinflammation associated with Alzheimer's disease. Including quercetin may enhance anti-inflammatory effects and support cognitive health.
